services.name: TGB Express Manicure
services.description: Our express manicure includes nail prep and colour of your choice.

services.name: TGB Manicure + BIAB
services.description: This manicure includes BIAB (builder in a bottle). Ideal for strengthening nails into shapes and maintaining length.

services.name: TGB Mani + Nail Art
services.description: The Gel Bottle manicure includes nail prep and bespoke nail art.

services.name: TGB Mani + BIAB + Nail Art
services.description: Includes BIAB (builder in a bottle). Ideal for strengthening nails into shapes and maintaining length. Finished with bespoke nail art.

services.name: TBG Soak Off
services.description: Our soak off removes Gel/BIAB and prepares nail for next treatment.

services.name: TGB Express Toes
services.description: Our express pedicure includes nail prep and a colour of your choice.

services.name: TGB Toes + Nail Art
services.description: Includes nail prep and bespoke nail art.

services.name: TGB Toes Soak Off
services.description: Our soak off removes Gel/BIAB and prepares nail for next treatment.

services.name: ELIM Express Pedicure + GEL
services.description: Our ELIM express pedicure includes gel polish with nail today, skin peel and foot massage.

services.name: ELIM Deluxe Pedi
services.description: Our ELIM deluxe treatment removes hard skin and calluses. Includes a nail tidy, skin peel, foot mask, foot soak and massage.

services.name: ELIM Deluxe Pedi + GEL
services.description: Our ELIM deluxe treatment removes hard skin and calluses. Includes a nail tidy, skin peel, foot mask, foot soak and massage. Finished with a gel polish.

services.name: HD Brows
services.description: Our HD treatment is a bespoke brow service that includes a 5 step process: Tinting, trimming, threading, tweezing and shaping.

services.name: HD Sculpt
services.description: Our sculpt treatment is brow lamination with a twist. Sculpt helps create fluffy, fuller brows with symmetry. This treatment includes the traditional 5 step process.

services.name: Brow Shape
services.description: An express service using tweezers to shape and tidy brows.

services.name: Brow Wax
services.description: Express wax treatment to re-shape and tidy brows.

services.name: Brow Tint
services.description: Express tint service to darken the natural brows and create a fuller look.

services.name: Brow Tint & Wax
services.description: Express wax and tint to tidy, re-shape and define brow look.

services.name: Hybrid Brows
services.description: A combination of traditional brow treatments with high-pigmented dye that stains the skin and hair for longer-lasting results. Ammonia-free formula.

services.name: LVL LASHES
services.description: Lash Lift: Lifts and curls your natural lashes to give the appearance of longer lashes.

services.name: Express Lash Tint
services.description: Express lash tint to darken your lashes to make them appear longer and fuller.

services.name: Lash Lift & Tint
services.description: Lifts, curls and tints your natural lashes to give the appearance of longer fuller lashes.
